last_episode_to_air.name: It's over, Leia
last_episode_to_air.overview: Milene processes Rayssa’s betrayal. Verônica comes clean about the fire. As Liz prepares to walk down the aisle, the truth about her family surfaces.

name: Maldivas
overview: Liz, a girl from Goiás moves to a capital in Rio de Janeiro to re-encounter her mother, who ends up dying in a mysterious fire. Trying to escape investigator Denilson, she will move among the residents of the Maldivadas condominium.

episodes.name: Welcome to Maldivas
episodes.overview: After getting engaged, Liz hits the road to reunite with her mother in Rio de Janeiro. A suspicious and mysterious fire occurs at the Maldivas condo.

episodes.name: You think I don't watch CSI?
episodes.overview: Investigator Denilson comes into play to uncover what happened to Liz’s mother. A gang breaks into the condo during a tribute to Patrícia.

episodes.name: I am Patrícia Duque!
episodes.overview: Liz starts an investigation on her own, which involves befriending Maldivas’ most notorious residents. But she soon lands on Detective Denilson’s radar.

episodes.name: Incendiary
episodes.overview: Denilson interrogates Liz. As Rayssa stages a poolside performance, a finding turns the investigation upside down and discloses Patrícia’s dark secrets.

episodes.name: Call Sandro
episodes.overview: Liz finds new evidence that completely changes the course of the investigation. Verônica proves to be deeply involved in Patrícia's vanishing.

episodes.name: Playing with Fire
episodes.overview: An old crime is linked to what occurred at Patrícia’s apartment. Verônica helps Patrícia to disappear again, but they encounter a nasty surprise.

episodes.name: It's over, Leia
episodes.overview: Milene processes Rayssa’s betrayal. Verônica comes clean about the fire. As Liz prepares to walk down the aisle, the truth about her family surfaces.
